Name: team_size_condition
Description: Team size must be greater than 5

Name: feature_status_condition
Description: Feature status must be in progress

Name: sprint_velocity_condition
Description: Sprint velocity must be greater than 10

Name: development_snapshot_quality_condition
Description: Development snapshot quality must be good

Name: product_backlog_entries_condition
Description: Product backlog entries must be greater than 10

Name: sprint_retrospective_improvement_actions_condition
Description: Sprint retrospective improvement actions must be less than 5

Name: scrum_board_columns_condition
Description: Scrum board columns must be greater than 3

Name: task_status_condition
Description: Task status must be in progress

Name: feature_documentation_quality_condition
Description: Feature documentation quality must be good

Name: project_budget_condition
Description: Project budget must be greater than 10000

Name: team_availability_condition
Description: Team availability must be greater than 80%
